text: Cesare Dujany Cesare Dujany or César Dujany (20 February 1920 in Saint-Vincent (Aosta Valley) – 31 March 2019 in Châtillon) was an Italian politician.Décès de l'ancien Sénateur César DujanyÈ morto a 99 anni Cesare Dujany, colonna della politica valdostana del Dopoguerra ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Presidents of Aosta Valley
title: Cesare Dujany
